mainText:
First and foremost, id like to wish my deepest and sincerest condolences 
to the Jobs family.  I know what it is like to lose some so close to 
you, and i hope that you find some happiness knowing that the world 
loved Steve.  I never had the honor of meeting him, but i feel like i 
knew him because of his amazing work.  Its amazing to know that he 
leaves millions of tiny pieces of himself all over there world in all 
the inventions he pioneered.
author: Hector
